hiveArticle.body:
# <center>Below Entries are for SteemitPhotoChallenge by @jamtaylor. All the images are taken in Bannerghatta National Park, Bangalore, Karnataka, India </center>

<hr>

# <center> Camera Used : Nokia 6 Mobile Camera - 16 MP, No Editing done </center>

<hr>

# <center> Entry 1 - Lioness who is going to Yawn </center>

<hr>

![20170723_151440.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmdis8CLqrqErKEWbhgTNZQ5Zwqjs6B5EeAGdyVMp5kTyc/20170723_151440.jpg)

<hr>

# <center> Entry 2 - A White Bengal Tiger, Resting </center>

<hr>

![20170723_151959.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmYcJS3XFnzZkaMQ8BjmLjvmdyfpfky9JPZEptfDtFpxGZ/20170723_151959.jpg)

<hr>

# <center> Entry 3 - A deer, I do not know the exact name </center>

<hr>

![20170723_162430.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmbXbZz3wJZxViU2qgikSG4sSZtjb8JCYX2gpVzdCjqWmL/20170723_162430.jpg)

<hr>

### <center> If you liked my work, please do follow @codingdefined </center>
